divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking with my wife and my granddaughter when i was looking up at a airplane and i saw seven objects in the sky flying just under the moon the sky was clear no clouds and the objects were moving in a group and two were close like they were attached toghther they were moving i would assume to be a fast speed then they stopped and began to hover i crossed the street the seven objects were gone this was also seen by my wife. they did not fly like regular airplanes or helicopters and the way they moved together was too weird to be considered normal for any type of aircraft i tried to take a picture but could not be seen with my phone
Summary: seven objects in a group moving like they were attached
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around September 9th 2012
